1.0.name: wordpress/buzz-this
1.0.description: This plug-in is used for displaying a button which let users to add links of your blog posts to Google Buzz. The button is delivered in two modes, being suitable for two languages: English ("buzz it") and Polish ("buzznij"). It lets you use either small or big type of Google Buzz button. You can post this button anywhere you want to, just using <?php if(function_exists('buzz_button') { echo buzz_button(); } ?> in source code of your template.
